quote: Nearly every crisis seems to be the worst one, but after it's over, it isn't so bad. – Harry S. Truman
fact: WWII fighter pilots in the South Pacific armed their airplanes while stationed with .50 caliber machine gun ammo belts measuring 27 feet before being loaded into the fuselage. If the pilots fired all their ammo at a target, he went through "the whole 9 yards", hence the term.
joke: “My Dog has no nose.” “How does he smell?” “Awful”
